comments.comments_text: It's like he was asking for a caution. Gavi (Barcelona) receives a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Brian Olivan (Espanyol) sees a yellow card. He should be more careful because one more challenge like that could result in a red card.

comments.comments_text: Leandro Cabrera (Espanyol) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Antonio Mateu Lahoz didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

comments.comments_text: Yet another yellow card and Jordi Alba (Barcelona) is sent off for talking out of turn to the referee. Definitely a harebrained moment from the player. Antonio Mateu Lahoz doesn't allow any discussions.
